List of books, you curious about!

Memorabilia is a book tracking and recommendation app designed to help you manage your reading journey. You can search for books, track what you\'re currently reading, what you want to read, and keep a record of books you\'ve finished reading.

The Search feature allows you to find books. Simply enter your query in the search bar and browse through the results. You can view detailed information about each book and add them to your reading lists.
The Currently Reading feature helps you keep track of books you are currently reading. You can update your progress, and mark books as finished once you complete them.
The Finished Reading feature allows you to keep a record of all the books you have finished reading. You can rate the books, leave reviews, and get recommendations for similar books to read next.
We are Bangkit Academy students, and this is our capstone project. Our team consists of passionate individuals dedicated to creating a user-friendly app that enhances your reading experience.
Our mission is to foster a love for reading by providing readers with an intuitive platform to track their reading habits, discover new books, and connect with a community of fellow book lovers.

Our vision is to create a world where reading is accessible to everyone. We believe that reading is a powerful tool for personal growth and development, and we want to make it easy for readers to discover new books and connect with other book lovers.
